title: Great Location
text: Great location for Soho, Greenwich, Chelsea area shopping & restaurants. Fun & happening hotel & bar for 20 & 30 something crowd. Cool lobby. However - overpriced, lacked a certain "polish"; AND... we left our room for two hours in the morning of last day to return & find an unmistakable intrusion. Someone had used the restroom (toilet seat up) & stepped into the tub/shower with black soot on their shoes. Several items had been obviously moved in the drawer but nothing taken - to our knowledge. A bit unsettling for two women. Would not return.
